t: Big Jeff Audio | eBay Stores
s: This is a family online business that started in 2014 on eBay and Amazon and has grown to be what it is now. Big Jeff initially started this business out of his home garage. Within 2 years his company had grown so much that he needed to rent a brick & mortar which allowed even more growth.
